Name: MarinePlant
Notes: A decorative underwater plant spawner which uses ShapeModelNo to derive the correct model to be loaded.

Obj_arg0.Name: Number of Plants
Obj_arg0.Description: The amount of plants to be placed. Default is 7.

Obj_arg1.Name: Texture Frame
Obj_arg1.Description: The texture frame to be used.

Obj_arg2.Name: Placement Range
Obj_arg2.Description: The range in which the plants will be positioned. Default is 200.

SW_APPEAR.Description: Appears when this switch is activated.

SW_AWAKE.Description: Enables rendering and resumes updates when this switch is active.
